physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular in shape and landscape in orientation. It features a man and a woman
 posing beside a sign board for the Royal Air Force Combat Training School. The man is wearing a military uniform and beret
 while the woman is dressed in a white shirt and skirt. Behind them
 there is a roofed building structure. The photograph is quite faded
 with black spots all over.

 Group Soldiers Military education
subject_terms_3:Photography Great Britain. Royal Air Force.
subject_terms_4:
sgcool_label_text:This is a personal photograph album that belonged to a Corporal A. Silver who spent 16 months in Singapore between 1951 and 1952. Silver was presumably a Jewish lady who was stationed in Singapore to serve at the Royal Air Force (RAF) Hospital at Changi. The album contains photographs that document her working and personal life
 including friends she made within the Jewish community in Singapore.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular in shape and landscape in orientation. It features a man and a woman, posing beside a sign board for the Royal Air Force Combat Training School. The man is wearing a military uniform and beret, while the woman is dressed in a white shirt and skirt. Behind them, there is a roofed building structure. The photograph is quite faded, with black spots all over.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Photographs Portraits, Group Soldiers Military education
metadata.subject_terms_3: Photography Great Britain. Royal Air Force.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This is a personal photograph album that belonged to a Corporal A. Silver who spent 16 months in Singapore between 1951 and 1952. Silver was presumably a Jewish lady who was stationed in Singapore to serve at the Royal Air Force (RAF) Hospital at Changi. The album contains photographs that document her working and personal life, including friends she made within the Jewish community in Singapore.
